text: Monterey Bay is a bay of the Pacific Ocean located on the coast of the U.S. state of California. The bay is south of the major cities of San Francisco and San Jose. The city of Santa Cruz is located at the north end of the bay. The city of Monterey is on the Monterey Peninsula at the south end. ==Communities around Monterey Bay== *Santa Cruz *Capitola *Aptos *Marina *Seaside *Sand City *Monterey *Watsonville *Salinas *Pacific Grove *Carmel *Carmel Valley *Carmel Highlands ==Other websites== *Live Monterey Bay Web Cam *Monterey Bay National Marine Sanctuary website ==References== Category:Bays of the United States Category:Bodies of water of California Category:Pacific Ocean Category:Northern California Category:Monterey County, California Category:Santa Cruz County, California
title: Monterey Bay
